#password.title: Password
#password.description: User password used to log in to network.2performant.com.

username.title: Username
username.description: User name used to log in to network.2performant.com.

monthsBack.title: Month delta
monthsBack.description:
The amount of months, including this one, for which to download the data. Functionality is as follows:
  • 0 - downloads data for current month
  • 1 - downloads data for current and previous month
  • 2 - downloads data for this, previous and month prior to that.
